title: (PC/Windows 10) Game Crashes Immediately Post Champion Select
body:
Since about mid September the game crashes immediately once the Champ Select screen and load screen swap places. I immediately get a "Bug Splat" without even a glimpse at the load screen. I'm on a Windows 10 System. It's a new device, and is capable of running this and any other modern game. I'm know running any known mods, plugins or additional aspects of the game. I'm not running a screen capture or record tool of any sort.

I don't know what to do anymore and really just want to play the game again.

**I have already**:

* Turned off the Xbox App's record function.

* Done an uninstall reinstall (twice).

* Run Hextech Repair Tool (twice).

* Changed DNS settings.


Thanks for any help you can provide.

replies.body: I see you've tried quite a bit of troubleshooting steps here, which definitely helps rule out some possibilities.  I recommend specifically going through each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure there aren't any other issues with drivers as well.  Hope that helps!
